name: GameFest 2023
description: GameFest 2023 is the ultimate gaming convention for gamers of all ages. Join us for a weekend of gaming tournaments, cosplay contests, and exclusive game previews.

name: GamerCon International
description: GamerCon International is a global celebration of gaming culture. Dive into the world of esports, meet your favorite streamers, and discover the latest gaming hardware.

name: Fantasy Game Expo
description: Step into a world of fantasy at the Fantasy Game Expo. Explore role-playing games, attend fantasy-themed panels, and meet authors of your favorite fantasy novels.

name: Retro Gaming Revival
description: Relive the nostalgia at Retro Gaming Revival. Play classic video games, browse retro game vendors, and participate in retro gaming competitions.

name: Indie Game Showcase
description: Discover the next big indie hits at the Indie Game Showcase. Play unreleased indie games, meet indie developers, and vote for your favorite indie game.

name: Virtual Reality Expo
description: Immerse yourself in the world of virtual reality at the Virtual Reality Expo. Experience the latest VR technology, try VR gaming, and attend VR development workshops.
